channel.title: 1337pkz - New devlopment!
channel.description:
[b]THIS IS NOT A ADVENTISMENT THREAD! I WILL CHANGE UP SOME SHIT LATER WHEN I ADD MORE UPDATES.[/b]
Third time is the charm lol. 1337pkz is back! it already has a couple players playing on it and i havnt really advertised it. This server use to be really popular and i recent added alot of stuff to it. I never switched sources and kept at it with delta so yeah.. Couple weeks ago i improved combat alot and it seems that its decent. Things are being working on every day do if you find glitch's please feel free to pm me. please note that this is server is did not leech any code from obvionpkz because some features are similar but will/might be coded differently..
Things Changed: 99% range and mage following. perfect max hit formula experience Lock Completly redone training areas. 3 different pk spots(main) Economy Based. Jad is only 2 last 2 waves but you need 10m to get in. Experience rate is 650+. Somedays i boost of exp rate making it x2.
PIC: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/21c5kr4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/25h1zps.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/23j5mqf.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/1jxob4.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/f2o30x.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/t9xr0j.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/5yf9qx.gif[/img]
